docs.text: weather-api-demo Setup Install git clone https://github.com/JohnCalhoun/weather-api-demo.git cd weather-api-demo make init cp config.yml.example config.yml Configure create open weather account and get an API Key https://openweathermap.org/guide open config.yml and replace put_your_key_here with your api key Example ./example.py Tests make tests
docs.title: Home

docs.text: git clone https://github.com/JohnCalhoun/weather-api-demo.git cd weather-api-demo make init cp config.yml.example config.yml
docs.title: Install

docs.text: create open weather account and get an API Key https://openweathermap.org/guide open config.yml and replace put_your_key_here with your api key
docs.title: Configure

docs.text: weather API API(self, api_key, units='imperial') Main class for accessing OpenWeather API Arguments api_key (str) : API key for OpenWeather. units (str) : standard, metric, or imperial (default) request API.request(self, path, params) Arguments path (str) : the path in the api to send to eg. weather or forecast params (dict) : additional params to be sent of url params in the request
docs.title: Docs
